name: Combat Dungeon
description:
Combat Dungeon is an excellent 2D action game with RPG elements in which you need to destroy ancient evil and free the captured dungeons

The main character needs to free his country from an ancient evil that has awakened from a long hibernation. The hero will have to clear the dungeons from enemies in order to find a way to the most important opponent, but it will be a difficult path because aggressive monsters will come across on our way, which we will need to destroy, and in this we will be helped by items found in the dungeon or new equipment that can be bought from a merchant.

Key Features :


- 12 dungeon levels to clear.

- a variety of enemies
